targets.expr: sum by (container,pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: 容器CPU节流时间(CPU Throttled seconds),没有数据说明CPU充足或者未做限制

targets.expr: sum by (container,pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: 容器CPU节流时间

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) by (container,pod)
sum by (pod,container)(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

- sum by (pod,container)(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (pod,container)(rate(container_fs_read_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

- sum by (pod,container)(rate(container_fs_write_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (pod,container)(rate(container_fs_reads_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))
- sum by (pod,container)(rate(container_fs_writes_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", job_name="$cadvisor_job_name", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: 每秒钟收发的包数量  1 p/s = 1000 mp/s
panels.title: 包传输速率
守护线程各状态线程数统计
非守护线程各状态线程数统计

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.legendFormat: System - 在内核中运行的系统进程
User - 在用户空间运行的用户程序
Nice - 在用户空间下执行的Niced进程
Steal - 在虚拟化环境中运行时，在其他操作系统上花费的时间

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: App - 用户空间应用使用量
PageTables - 用于在虚拟和物理内存地址之间映射的内存
SwapCache - 跟踪已从交换中提取但尚未修改的页面的内存
Slab - 内核用于缓存数据结构以供自己使用的内存 (缓存，如inode，dentry等)
Buffers - 块设备 (如硬盘) 缓存
Hardware Corrupted - 内核标识为损坏/不工作的RAM量

panels.title: 网络传输速率(无虚拟和回环网卡)

panels.description: 文件描述符打开数(File Descriptor)
panels.title: 文件描述符打开数

panels.description: 系统在特定时间段内用于处理 I/O 操作的时间占总时间的比例,反映了系统在处理 I/O 任务时的繁忙程度
panels.title: I/O 利用率

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
list.label: 集群
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'

list.label: 查询方式
list.name: service_type
list.query: 按K8s查询 : .*, 按虚机查询 :  ,

list.definition: query_result(group by (svc_name) (kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{vm="$service_type", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) or group by (svc_name) (kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{pod=~"$pod",namespace=~"$namespace", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}))
list.label: 应用名
list.name: service_name

query.query: query_result(group by (svc_name) (kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{vm="$service_type", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) or group by (svc_name) (kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{pod=~"$pod",namespace=~"$namespace", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}))

list.definition: query_result( group by (node_name) (container_memory_rss{job_name="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor",pod=~"$pod",pod!="", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) or group by (node_name) ( kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name="$service_name",svc_name!="", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}))
list.label: 相关节点
list.name: related_nodes

query.query: query_result( group by (node_name) (container_memory_rss{job_name="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor",pod=~"$pod",pod!="", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) or group by (node_name) ( kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name="$service_name",svc_name!="", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}))
